code: export var BASE_URL='https://auth.nomoreparties.co';export var register=function register(password,email){return fetch("".concat(BASE_URL,"/signup"),{method:"POST",headers:{'Content-Type':'application/json'},body:JSON.stringify({password:password,email:email})}).then(function(res){if(!res.ok){return Promise.reject("\u041E\u0448\u0438\u0431\u043A\u0430: ".concat(res.status));}return res.json();});};export var authorize=function authorize(password,email){return fetch("".concat(BASE_URL,"/signin"),{method:"POST",headers:{'Content-Type':'application/json'},body:JSON.stringify({password:password,email:email})}).then(function(res){if(!res.ok){return Promise.reject("\u041E\u0448\u0438\u0431\u043A\u0430: ".concat(res.status));}return res.json();});};export var getContent=function getContent(token){return fetch("".concat(BASE_URL,"/users/me"),{method:"GET",headers:{'Content-Type':'application/json',"Authorization":"Bearer ".concat(token)}}).then(function(res){if(!res.ok){return Promise.reject("\u041E\u0448\u0438\u0431\u043A\u0430: ".concat(res.status));}return res.json();});};
